name: Сheck it twice
description:
A simulator in which the main character is in a hurry to get to work. He wakes up and tries to pull himself together. However, he has a complete mess at home. The iron is working, the window is not closed, the alarm is without batteries. But he thinks that nothing bad will happen. However, Murphy's law works, and leaving the iron turns the apartment to ashes, and the turned off alarm without problems allows the robbers to take out all the property. Help our hero fix and shut down everything that can lead to the destruction of the apartment. To do this, pick up the tools scattered throughout the apartment and fix everything that can be repaired with them, may luck be with you!

Control:
wasd- walking  
shift - running
LMB -  selection of items 
1 - 9 or SCM selection of items from inventory
LMB using the item 

Items in the game can be turned on / off to do this, press LMB in the area of action
Also, items in the game can be repaired for select the appropriate item from the inventory and click LMB in the area of effect

the game works with errors and may not start at all! Be careful for damaged PCs, we are not responsible! It's Joke, just try it
